title: Glen Echo Park: Dentzel Carousel
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Dentzel Carousel              Dentzel Carousel          Operating for over 90 years, the 1921 Dentzel Carousel is an iconic feature that visitors of all ages can enjoy! Tickets are $1.25 each. Operating hours are as follows:   May through August Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday, 10:00 am to 2:00 pm Saturday and Sunday, 12:00 pm to 6:00 pm   September Saturday and Sunday, 12:00 pm to 6:00 pm   For the most up-to-date schedule and information, please visit www.glenechopark.org.
